pkgmetadata.longdescription: Minimize 1/2 x^T G x - a^T xSubject to C.T x >= bThis routine uses the the Goldfarb/Idnani dual algorithm [1].References----------1) D. Goldfarb and A. Idnani (1983). A numerically stable dual method for solving strictly convex quadratic programs. Mathematical Programming, 27, 1-33.
